tool_description: Moxtra delivers a mobile-first collaboration platform that can be embedded within existing applications, allowing developers to deploy a powerful mobile solution – quickly and affordably, without long development cycles. We transform innovative mobile apps and legacy software solutions alike into tools for social business, keeping distributed teams engaged and productive inside their existing workflow.
name: Moxtra
title: Moxtra

api_list.name: Download binder pages
Get User
api_list.description: Get the contents of a user object identified by {user_id}

api_list.name: Get Binder details
User unread feeds
api_list.description: Get the number of a user's unread feeds identified by {user_id}

api_list.name: Binder List
Page Download
api_list.description: Download a page identified by {binder_id} and {page_id}

api_list.name: User Picture
api_list.description: Get a user's profile picture identified by {user_id}

api_list.name: Get All Pages
api_list.description: Get the details of all the pages in a binder identified by {binder_id}

api_list.name: List Todo items in the binder
api_list.description: Get all todo items in the binder identified by {binder_id}

api_list.name: Get Meets List
Binder View Only Link
api_list.description: Get a view only link for the binder identified by {binder_id}

api_list.name: Get Binder Conversations
api_list.description: Get the conversations ins a binder identified by {binder_id}. The feed result is in Activity Stream format.

optional_parameters.name: timestamp
optional_parameters.description: Feeds after the specified time in milliseconds since 1/1/1970 0:0:0

api_list.name: Get Some Pages
api_list.description: Get the details of some pages in a binder identified by {binder_id}

api_list.name: Get Page Comments
api_list.description: Get the comments on a page identified by {page_id} and {binder_id}

api_list.name: User timeline
api_list.description: Get a user's timeline for all activities in Moxtra identified by {user_id}. The feed result is in an Activity Stream format.

api_list.name: Global Search in Moxtra
api_list.description: Search by {query_string}, the query string can be separated by space for OR operations

api_list.name: Get Categories
Get User Contacts
api_list.description: Get a user's contact list by {user_id}
